name: quicklink
description: Faster subsequent page-loads by prefetching in-viewport links during idle time
author: addyosmani <addyosmani@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run build && mocha test/bootstrap.js --recursive test
scripts.release: cross-var npm run build -s && cross-var git commit -am $npm_package_version && cross-var git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
